monkeyspeaks.monkeyText: Which seems more appropriate?
Here are your choices - pick which one feels easiest and drag it to the top
Choose which feels next easiest and drag it into the second position
Drag next easiest into the third position
Once you're satisfied with the order tap the arrow to proceed

Listed below are different ways a person may feel when their “prevent instinct” is triggered and they experience worry, fear, anxiety or panic

Select the reactions which come closest to describing how you have felt or behaved in the past
Be specific: think of actual events. Recalling where you were will also help to bring back more detail

Below are the reactions you selected

 You now need to choose the three that feel most appropriate for you

 Trust your gut feelings here

All done.

Next time you launch CrisisCalm I will ask if the below describes how you are feeling.  I will then dispel those feelings of worry, fear, anxiety or panic and help you to calm down.
